title: World Flags Recall
description: Can you recall the distinctive features of flags from around the world? Put your memory to the test!

questions.question: Which country's flag features a red circle on a white background, representing the rising sun?
The flag of Canada prominently features which leaf in its center?
Which country's flag is the only national flag that is not rectangular or square?
The Union Jack, a combination of three crosses, is the flag of which country?
Which Scandinavian country's flag features a white cross on a red background?
The flag of Brazil features a blue globe with white stars and a banner. What color is the diamond shape surrounding the globe?
Which African country's flag features a green, white, and green vertical tricolor?
The flag of which country features a crescent moon and star on a green background?
Which country's flag features a dragon on a yellow and orange background?
The tricolor flag of green, white, and red (left to right) belongs to which European country?
Which country's flag features the Southern Cross constellation and the Union Jack?
The flag of South Africa is unique for having how many colors?
Which country's flag features an eagle perched on a cactus, eating a serpent?
The flag of Switzerland is distinctive for being one of only two square sovereign-state flags. What is on it?
Which Nordic country's flag has a blue background with a yellow or gold cross?
